0.0: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide <cryo>2%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of <cryo>12%</cryo> All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
